'''Tom Stone''' is a freelance scriptwriter, writer and editor. He wrote scripts for videos on the Minecraft [[YouTube]] channel, and was was the former head of editorial for [[Minecraft.net]] at [[Mojang Studios]] until February 2020. He also joined Mojang on January 26, 2017, when he was a creative communications assistant, and announced his departure from Mojang in an article on Minecraft.net,<ref>{{Mcnet|happy-holidays0|Happy Holidays|December 23, 2019|Tom Stone}}</ref> but he continued writing articles and videos as a freelance worker.
